TABLE.NAME: plagiarism_mcopyfind
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for plagiarism_mcopyfind, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: plagiarism_mcopyfind_report
TABLE.COMMENT: Report information of matches and id

TABLE.NAME: plagiarism_mcopyfind_config
TABLE.COMMENT: contains mcopyfind specific settings for each course module

FIELD.NAME: upload
FIELD.COMMENT: When to upload to plagscan (never, manually, automatically)

FIELD.NAME: complete
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the automatic upload was last done

FIELD.NAME: username
FIELD.COMMENT: The username of the user whose account should be used for uploading files from this assignment

FIELD.NAME: show_report_to_students
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag to show the report to students

FIELD.NAME: show_students_links
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag to show links or PlagLevel to students

FIELD.NAME: ownerid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the owner who created the submission

FIELD.NAME: enable_online_text
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable Plagiarism check for online text (not file)

FIELD.NAME: exclude_from_repository
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag to exclude submissions from the repository

FIELD.NAME: exclude_self_matches
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates if should flag the submissions from the same user across multiple submission attempts

TABLE.NAME: plagiarism_mcopyfind_match
TABLE.COMMENT: A match of two documents and their contenthashes.
